title: NRL star Braith Anasta and fiancée Rachael Lee step out after announcing their engagement
text:
Braith Anasta and Rachael Lee couldn't wipe the smiles off their faces on Wednesday as they were pictured for the first time since getting engaged.

The retired NRL star, 37, and his personal trainer fiancée ran errands in Sydney, with the bride-to-be proudly flashing her huge diamond ring.

On Tuesday, the couple announced their engagement by sharing a sweet video to Instagram which showed Braith proposing with the help of their three children.

Congrats! Braith Anasta (pictured) and fiancée Rachael Lee couldn't wipe the smiles off their faces as they stepped out in Sydney on Wednesday after announcing their engagement

Braith looked overjoyed on Wednesday as the newly-engaged couple headed out.

While walking down the street, personal trainer Rachael trailed behind him on the phone before they later went their separate ways.

With wedding planning presumably starting now, the brunette appeared focused as she hit the shops after stopping at a local pharmacy.

Look at that bling! The retired NRL star, 37, led his bride-to-be (pictured) as they ran errands, with the stunning personal trainer flaunting her huge diamond ring

Happy times ahead! On Tuesday, the couple shared their happy news with fans on Instagram and revealed how their children helped as Braith got down on one knee

Dressed down in leggings and an orange bomber jacket with minimal makeup on, Rachael oozed natural beauty while talking on her phone.

She later appeared deep in thought as she put her mobile phone in her pocket and continued walking.

Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the personal trainer announced the news, with a video of Braith dropping to one knee.

She wrote: 'I'm SO in love and happy... we're getting MARRIED!'

Sharing the happy news? While walking down the street, personal trainer Rachael trailed behind Braith on the phone before they later went their separate ways

Wow! Rachael's huge engagement ring (pictured) is from Shannakian Fine Jewellery

'My amazing, love of my life and future husband and my three darling babeees (sic) surprised me w (sic) the most beautiful perfect proposal!' Rachael's post began.

I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm SO in love and happy!! We're getting MARRIED.'

She added: 'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'

So much to do! With wedding planning presumably starting now, the brunette appeared focused as she hit the shops after stopping at a local pharmacy

Stunning! Dressed down in leggings and an orange bomber jacket with minimal makeup on, Rachael oozed natural beauty

In the clip, Braith can be seen waiting for Rachael to walk outside - presumably in the beachside backyard of their eastern suburbs unit - with their children by his side.

He drops down to one knee while wearing matching T-shirts with the kids which read: 'Will U (sic) marry me.'

Braith pulls out the ring and tells her: 'I love you bubba (sic)... will you marry me?'

Thinking about your dress? Rachael later appeared deep in thought as she put her mobile phone in her pocket and continued walking

'I'm SO in love and happy': Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the personal trainer announced the news, with a video of Braith dropping to one knee

Romantic! In the clip, Braith can be seen waiting for Rachael to walk outside - presumably in the beachside backyard of their eastern suburbs unit - with their children by his side

Braith also shared some snaps and videos to his Instagram page on Tuesday, writing: 'Today was a great day... I love you Rachael Lee. Let's do life together my baby.'

He revealed in his post that the ring was from Shannakian Fine Jewellery.

Braith - who was married to Jodi Anasta from October 2012 to December 2015 - began dating Rachael Lee in 2016.

They share daughter Gigi, one, together, while Braith has daughter Aleeia, five, with ex Jodi, and Rachael Lee has an older son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship.
description: Braith Anasta and  Rachael Lee couldn't wipe the smiles off their faces on Wednesday as they were pictured for the first time since getting engaged.
authors: Chloe Lee-Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
